metadata.description: Seattle Seahawks win Super Bowl LX (Feb 2026, 2025 NFL season)

outcome_space.description: Who will win Super Bowl LX (Feb 2026, 2025 NFL season)?

base_case.fsp_resolution: FSP=1 if {outcome} is declared Super Bowl champion by the NFL (evaluates to TRUE). FSP=0.5 if the competition is cancelled/abandoned with no champion adjudicated and {outcome} has not been officially eliminated/forfeited (evaluates to UNRESOLVED). FSP=0 if the champion is a different team or {outcome} is officially eliminated/forfeits (evaluates to FALSE). Data sources: Primary <https://www.nfl.com/scores>; Secondary <https://apnews.com/hub/nfl>.

edge_cases.condition: The competition is cancelled/abandoned at any stage with no champion adjudicated, and {outcome} has not been officially eliminated/forfeited.
edge_cases.fsp_resolution: FSP=0.5 (evaluates to UNRESOLVED) - there is no formally adjudicated Super Bowl champion. Data sources: Primary <https://www.nfl.com/scores>; Secondary <https://apnews.com/hub/nfl>.

edge_cases.condition: {outcome} is officially eliminated/forfeits (at any stage), regardless of later cancellation status.
edge_cases.fsp_resolution: FSP=0 (evaluates to FALSE) - {outcome} did not win the Super Bowl. Data sources: Primary <https://www.nfl.com/scores>; Secondary <https://apnews.com/hub/nfl>.

oracle_config.description: Manual oracle system for product settlement
